EDUCATION.Institute Name: ABV-Indian Institute of Information Technology and Management

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Shealth is a health framework by Samsung to track day to day fitness activities of user to help him keeping health in check by recording data of exercises like running, walking ,hiking, cycling etc. or lifestyle habits related to food, water, heart rate or calories.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Samsung Mobile Gateway and Clinical Decision System
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: System to provide real time monitoring of health conditions, predict the arrhythmia, notifies the physician and patients with the detected arrhythmia alerts and Electro Cardio Graph .The proposed system involved ISO/IEEE11073 (X73) family of standards supporting high quality medical sensors, as well as wireless transport protocols (e.g. Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Zigbee)
